attributes.action: Raise minimum wage for under 18s to the equivalent of over 18s
attributes.additional_details: People are taking advantage of under 18s by employing them knowing that they can pay them far less and get away with it. £4.62 for 1 hours work is in no way fair considering over 18s are getting paid considerably more.
attributes.background: Raise the minimum wage for under 18s from £4.62 to the equivalent of Over 18s.

rejection.details:
We understand you're concerned about the minimum wage for under-18s. However the equivalent of the national minimum wage for over-18s, known as the national living wage, increases steadily between the ages of 18 and 23. It's therefore not clear which of these wages you want under-18s to be required to be paid. You can find out more about these rates here: https://www.gov.uk/national-minimum-wage-rates.

You might like to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action:

'Make the minimum wage equal for all': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/600960
